Name: Death Corp
About the game: Art is a young college graduate looking for his first serious job. After a series of unsuccessful interviews, the Grim Reaper itself materializes in front of Art's eyes and, impressed by the young man's skills, offers him a job as an intern at his own company, Death Corp. Meet tons of ridiculous characters, recollect the souls of those who recently passed away and, sometimes, push forward fate by solving outrageous and hilarious puzzles. Dark humor with bright colors scenes divided in independent chapters with constant references to film and book genres, pop culture and classic point and click games. Features Classic 2D point-and-click adventure (just the way you like it!) A wicked story full of fantasy and humor Hand-drawn backgrounds, characters, and interface! Mixed of frame by frame and squeleton animations Play the Demo now!
